author: Lobo_da_boss_
title: One of my favorite minifig head prints
review:
Opening;

Black canary is not a lesser known DC superhero so it is shocking that this is her first and so far last minifigure appearance .

The Minifigure-

This minifigures has the regular female hair piece in a cool yellow colour , a fairly bland forward facial expression but an incredible screaming alternative face which could relate to her canary cry from the comics or coincide with her accessory , her torso has a nice jacket print and her legs have nice printing with subsequent side leg printing .

The accessories -

The Accessories include a 2×2 black small disk , a 1×3 black long bar , a black clip and a printed microphone print to make the stand and microphone , the stand is the Batman movie series two printed Batman emblem piece . In conclusion this is a very nice fig and the second face print really makes it worth while .

In conclusion -

coming from the opinion of an individual who loves new getting new DC characters as minifigures I would recommend this to DC fans and fans of interesting and cool minifigure pieces .

author: Odeinoichus
title: Sings like a Canary.
review:
Set #71020 Black Canary: Our second-to-last hero in this Series is a DC staple, Black Canary is quite familiar to many fans of DC comics and here she has her trademark fishnets as well as some tights, a jacket, and a collar at the neckline. The printed detailing of her costume is quite impressive, it'd be more impressive if they used dual-moulding, sadly that was not the case.

Her blonde hair hides the fact that she has two expressions, one shouting her head off to unleash her power and the other with a plain smile. Carrying a microphone stand into battle seems a tad off, but maybe it's to amplify her sonic wail.

A nice offering and a solid figure with some great detailing. Highly Recommended.
